languages.text: Однако когда шаттл достигает ксеноского корабля, отчет спасательного отряда застигает офицеров мостика врасплох: правый борт судна пробит макроорудиями неизвестного имперского корабля. Выживших... нет.

However, when the shuttle reaches the xenoship, the rescue team's report catches the bridge crew off-guard: the vessel's starboard side has been breached by the macro-weapons of an unknown Imperial voidship. There are... no survivors.
languages.original_text: Однако когда шаттл достигает ксеноского корабля, отчет спасательного отряда застигает офицеров мостика врасплох: правый борт судна пробит макроорудиями неизвестного имперского корабля. Выживших... нет.

traits.locale_text: However, when the shuttle reaches the xenoship, the rescue team's report catches the bridge crew off-guard: the vessel's starboard side has been breached by the macroweapons of an unknown Imperial voidship. There are... no survivors.

However, when the shuttle reaches the xenoship, the rescue team's report catches the bridge crew off-guard: the vessel's starboard side has been breached by the macroweapons of an unknown Imperial voidship. There are... no survivors.

However, when the shuttle reaches the xenoship, the rescue team's report catches the bridge crew off-guard: the vessel's starboard side has been breached by the macroweapons of an unknown Imperial voidship. There are... no survivors.

However, when the shuttle reaches the xenoship, the rescue team's report catches the bridge crew off-guard: the vessel's starboard side has been breached by the macro-weapons of an unknown Imperial voidship. There are... no survivors.

However, when the shuttle reaches the xenoship, the rescue team's report catches the bridge crew off-guard: the vessel's starboard side has been breached by the macro-weapons of an unknown Imperial voidship. There are... no survivors.

languages.text: 然而，当穿梭机抵达异形飞船时，救援队的报告让舰桥上的所有船员猝不及防。飞船遭到了身份不明的帝国虚空舰攻击，右舷被大型舰载武器破坏了，船上……没有幸存者。
languages.original_text: However, when the shuttle reaches the xenoship, the rescue team's report catches the bridge crew off-guard: the vessel's starboard side has been breached by the macro-weapons of an unknown Imperial voidship. There are... no survivors.

traits.locale_text: 然而，当穿梭机抵达异形飞船时，救援队的报告让舰桥上的所有船员猝不及防。飞船遭到了身份不明的帝国虚空舰攻击，右舷被大型舰载武器破坏了，船上……没有幸存者。

languages.text: しかし、シャトルが異種族船に到着した時、ブリッジのクルーは、救助チームから意表を突く報告を受けた。船の右舷側が未知の帝国のヴォイドシップの巨大兵器によって突破されたというものだ。生存者は…ひとりもいない。
languages.original_text: However, when the shuttle reaches the xenoship, the rescue team's report catches the bridge crew off-guard: the vessel's starboard side has been breached by the macro-weapons of an unknown Imperial voidship. There are... no survivors.

traits.locale_text: しかし、シャトルが異種族船に到着した時、ブリッジのクルーは、救助チームから意表を突く報告を受けた。船の右舷側が未知の帝国のヴォイドシップの巨大兵器によって突破されたというものだ。生存者は…ひとりもいない。

languages.text: Sin embargo, cuando la lanzadera llega a la nave xenos, el informe del equipo de rescate pilla a la tripulación del puente con la guardia baja: el lado de estribor de la nave ha sido atravesado por las macroarmas de una nave del vacío imperial desconocida. No hay... supervivientes.
languages.original_text: However, when the shuttle reaches the xenoship, the rescue team's report catches the bridge crew off-guard: the vessel's starboard side has been breached by the macro-weapons of an unknown Imperial voidship. There are... no survivors.

traits.locale_text: Sin embargo, cuando la lanzadera llega a la nave xenos, el informe del equipo de rescate pilla a la tripulación del puente con la guardia baja: el lado de {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}estribor{/g} de la nave ha sido atravesado por las macroarmas de una nave del vacío imperial desconocida. No hay... supervivientes.

languages.text: Als das Shuttle aber das Xenoschiff erreicht, überrascht der Bericht des Rettungsteams die Crew auf der Brücke: Die Steuerbordseite des Schiffs wurde von den Makrowaffen eines unbekannten imperialen Raumschiffs aufgerissen. Es gibt ... keine Überlebenden.
languages.original_text: However, when the shuttle reaches the xenoship, the rescue team's report catches the bridge crew off-guard: the vessel's starboard side has been breached by the macro-weapons of an unknown Imperial voidship. There are... no survivors.

traits.locale_text: Als das Shuttle aber das Xenoschiff erreicht, überrascht der Bericht des Rettungsteams die Crew auf der Brücke: Die Steuerbordseite des Schiffs wurde von den Makrowaffen eines unbekannten imperialen Raumschiffs aufgerissen. Es gibt ... keine Überlebenden.

languages.text: Cependant, quand la navette arrive à destination, le rapport de l'équipe de sauvetage prend au dépourvu l'ensemble des hommes rassemblés sur la passerelle : le flanc tribord du vaisseau xénos a été éventré par les macro-canons d'un bâtiment impérial non identifié et il n'y a... aucun survivant.
languages.original_text: However, when the shuttle reaches the xenoship, the rescue team's report catches the bridge crew off-guard: the vessel's starboard side has been breached by the macro-weapons of an unknown Imperial voidship. There are... no survivors.

traits.locale_text: Cependant, quand la navette arrive à destination, le rapport de l'équipe de sauvetage prend au dépourvu l'ensemble des hommes rassemblés sur la passerelle : le flanc tribord du vaisseau xénos a été éventré par les macro-canons d'un bâtiment impérial non identifié et il n'y a... aucun survivant.

languages.text: Ne var ki mekik zeno gemisine ulaşınca kurtarma ekibinin verdiği rapor, köprüdeki mürettebatı hazırlıksız yakalıyor: Geminin sancak tarafı, bilinmez bir İmparatorluk uçsuz gemisinin makro silahlarının saldırısına uğramış. Sağ kalan kimse yok.
languages.original_text: However, when the shuttle reaches the xenoship, the rescue team's report catches the bridge crew off-guard: the vessel's starboard side has been breached by the macro-weapons of an unknown Imperial voidship. There are... no survivors.
